QuestData.Title: Akarek Avenged
QuestData.Description:
The last of those traitors involved in taking down Margrave Akarek are dead.
It will not bring our Margrave back, but I am still pleased.
My Baroness wished for us to inform Margrave Sin'dane that the job was done before departing for Ardenweald.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet with Margrave Sin'Dane in the Exoramas in the House of Rituals.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet with Margrave Sin'Dane in the Exoramas in the House of Rituals.
